lead_paragraph: It is believed to be the first time an American citizen has been abducted in the Sahel region of Africa, where Al Qaeda and criminal gangs have targeted French nationals and other Europeans.

headline.main: Gunmen Kidnap American Aid Worker in Niger and Kill 2
